title: Managing Expectations for Grandparents
itunes:author: Guest: Michele Howe
itunes:summary:
It can be painful if your parents aren't involved in your kids' lives. John and Danny offer encouragement to parents who feel like their kids are missing out.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast. Or, call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get the book "There's a Reason They Call It GRANDparenting" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2021-06-15?refcd=1101201

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/managing-expectations-for-grandparents/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: http://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey
